H3.text: who plays hannibal in silence of the lambs. Anthony Hopkins

A4.text: He won two Academy Awards for Best Actor for playing Hannibal Lecter in the horror thriller The Silence of the Lambs (1991)

A5.text: Hopkins reprised his role as Lecter twice; in Ridley Scott's Hannibal (2001), and Red Dragon (2002)
